Bring Your 3D Models to Life

mesh2motion is an open-source application that allows you to animate your 3D models using a skeleton. It supports importing GLB and GLTF formats and provides a library of animations for both human and animal skeletons.

With mesh2motion, you can easily position the skeleton inside your mesh and animate it with a few clicks. The application is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making it accessible for both beginners and experienced users.

Video Walkthrough

How it Works

  1. Import your 3D model
  2. Choose a skeleton (human or animal)
  3. Position the skeleton inside your mesh
  4. Animate your mesh
  5. Export animations to GLB file

Features

  • Supports importing GLB and GLTF formats
  • Human and animal skeleton options
  • Intuitive skeleton positioning
  • Animations provided (free human animation library from https://quaternius.com/)
  • Export animations for web or game engines
